description: CSI brings to you another workshop this week on Web Designing. Web development is a very enticing field to work on, and we're here to help you figure out the basics of it. Come join us to learn about all the key aspects of an amazing web design. Resource person: Hashif TP, Founder and CEO, A S Designs Pvt Ltd. Attendance benefits shall be provided to all the participants. Students are required to bring their own laptops, with Adobe Dreamweaver pre-installed. Installation can be done in college with the guidance of us before the session starts. Make the best out of this opportunity and have a sneak peek into the most important part of web navigation.

Come participate in CSI's event, Minute to Win It. Arrive in teams of 2 and power through 3 rounds of exciting games to claim the title of the ultimate champion. Winners shall be awarded exciting cash prizes. Here's to hoping we see you all in high spirits this Wednesday.
